line.comment: * We create a special array to handle explorer sync, for performance purposes. See Mayhem.GetExplorers.
* $sectors = [HOMEBASE]-> find all sectors within $distance jumps: Only known sectors=[FALSE]
* For the AI, we manage sector blacklist here.
* Synchronization with other explorers (same homebase only).
* START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox': text=$t icon=29 timeout=0 fadeout=0

sval.val: No satellite at homebase or Outpost
We create a special array to handle explorer sync, for performance purposes. See Mayhem.GetExplorers.
$sectors = [HOMEBASE]-> find all sectors within $distance jumps: Only known sectors=[FALSE]
For the AI, we manage sector blacklist here.
Synchronization with other explorers (same homebase only).
START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox': text=$t icon=29 timeout=0 fadeout=0
